statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_rating FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-10-01' AND feedback_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY patient_id, satisfaction_rating
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, feedback_date, satisfaction_rating, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date

SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM patient_feedback WHERE rating > 3;

SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, rating FROM patient_feedback WHERE rating = 5;
